__e: Hey! I'm just a little depressed and unshowered 'cause I'm having a few boy issues, and... Shut up!
Sorry you got depressed. Sorry Dad couldn't handle being around at home.
And so I went. I went without you, and then I came back... for you.
[Imitating joyce] "The direction my life has been going in "has been downhill for so long... "I can't take it, and so I'm too depressed to go on living anymore."
I was, however, still depressed over my mother's death and my father's decline.
Well, I was still really depressed about my dad and he had lost his dad.
